Taunton.Morse House (Taunton, Massachusetts):
The Morse House is a historic house located at 6 Pleasant Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It is a 1-1/2 story wood-frame structure, with a gable roof and clapboard siding. It is considered a fine example of Gothic Revival architecture in a cottage form, with vergeboard in the gables, and a bracketed porch.
